CBI-AECOM Infrastructure Survey
A new parliament brings with it new agendas and refreshed perspectives. As the Government settles into office, and political priorities for the next 5 years are firmed up, it is crucial that the business voice is being heard.
From energy security, to new runways, to delivery of projects such as HS2, this will be a crucial period for infrastructure, and the CBI will be working to shape policy at every available opportunity.
To be most effective though, we need input from members on what matters most to you - we want to hear about the projects you need delivered to help your business succeed, and what government can do to best support their delivery.
We would therefore like to invite you to respond to this year's CBI-AECOM Infrastructure Survey. The results of the survey will shape the CBI's dialogue with government, while also making the case for priority improvements to the UK's energy, transport, waste, water and digital infrastructure.
Click on the link below to complete the survey and have your say https://www.snapsurveys.com/wh/s.asp?k=143231305509
The report will be released in October, and all respondents will receive an electronic copy.
Thank you very much for taking the time to support this important piece of work. The closing date for responses is 17th July.
Kind regards,
John Cridland Director General CBI
Richard Robinson, Chief Executive, Civil Infrastructure, EMEA&I AECOM
From around the corner to around the globe, AECOM's team of dedicated professionals work to positively impact lives, transform communities and make the world a better place.
